product.name: Snow Fairy
product.description:
{"time": 1701182784547, "blocks": [{"id": "7H_UmGsCLg", "data": {"text": "The defining Lush scent of the season, Snow Fairy, is back! As sweet and sparkly as you've come to know and love, keep those bubblegum vibes going with these four Snow Fairy-scented bath, body, and shower treats."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "b4UstfcT2e", "data": {"text": "What\u2019s this ethical gift made of?
Ribbon: 100% recycled polyester made from recycled drinks bottles.
Box: Constructed and finished by hand in the UK, and made from 100% recycled board. Reuse again, regift, or recycle with paper recycling.
Eco Pops: Your gift will be packed with these expanded starch biodegradable product protectors."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "4PPlMkv2WK", "data": {"text": "Contains:
Groovy Fairy bath bomb
Snow Fairy Roll bubble bar
Snow Fairy shower gel 100g
Snow Fairy body lotion 50g500"}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
product.seoDescription: Shine like Snow Fairy! We've wrapped up four of your favourite bath, body, and shower products in this gift.

translation.name: Snow Fairy
translation.description: {"time": 1695140572262, "blocks": [{"id": "pYMCJltrhb", "data": {"text": "This Christmas, unleash the power of our famous bubblegummy fragrance. Use Snow Fairy Roll Bubble Bar to create a tub filled with enchanting foam, or relax in the dazzling, colorful waters of Groovy Fairy Bath Bomb. If you prefer to stand, then lather up with the product that started it all: Snow Fairy Shower Gel, and finish by layering on the creamy body lotion for a luxurious, skin-softening experience. These four sweeties are bundled all together in a reusable hat box that you can use to store your Lush stash."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "vritF5FZZv", "data": {"text": "Made in Canada."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "NvsMIiHYLf", "data": {"text": "Gift contains:"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "VTtA8VUQXo", "data": {"text": "Groovy Fairy Bath Bomb"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "sepufRJGsK", "data": {"text": "Snow Fairy Shower Gel 3.3 fl oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "7sQ-ncZdA9", "data": {"text": "Snow Fairy Roll Bubble Bar"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "grDrilzkHm", "data": {"text": "Snow Fairy Body Lotion 1.7 oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
translation.seoDescription: Four limited-edition treats featuring our bestselling cotton candy scent, Snow Fairy, all bundled up in a reusable hat box.

images.alt: Snow Fairy gift box and its 4 included Snow Fairy products are on a dark chromatic platform among geometric shapes.

product.name: Winter Garden
product.description:
{"time": 1701439054078, "blocks": [{"id": "KXq7orLcPr", "data": {"text": "Plant yourself in your shower, and let these five floral and fruity products blossom around you. Dig into the reusable hat box, bursting with a blooming bouquet, and dig out the exquisite Rose Jam shower gel, or smooth all over with the apples and illipe butter in Once Upon A Time body lotion. Whatever you pick, you'll get that flourishing feeling."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "97OoUY9muR", "data": {"text": "Winter Garden's artwork is designed by Sally Kelly, inspired by the joyful exuberance of blossoming flowers and fruits. Painted in vivid oils against inky black grounds, the resulting tableaux conjure magical, moonlit scenes where every element overflows with irrepressible and effervescent energy."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "u2BggJNwGM", "data": {"text": "What\u2019s this ethical gift made of?
Ribbon: 100% recycled polyester made from recycled drinks bottles.
Box: These colourful fluted boxes are made from 100% recycled materials, and made in the UK.
Eco Pops: Your gift will be packed with these expanded starch biodegradable product protectors."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "YN_SIkzvgM", "data": {"text": "Contains:
Rose Jam shower gel 100g
Scrubee body butter
Gorgeous facial moisturiser 10g
Christmas Cranberry soap 100g
Once Upon A Time body lotion 50g
Berry Berry Christmas shower gel 120g
Sweet Wild Orange hand balm 50g"}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
product.seoDescription: Pick your favourites from our Lush garden, a selection of seven fruity and floral-scented products for the bath and body.

translation.name: Winter Garden
translation.description: {"time": 1695099972053, "blocks": [{"id": "8Nz2qgaJBU", "data": {"text": "Flourish in a floral and fruity shower with an exfoliating body butter and three spectacular cleansers, including bestselling Rose Jam Shower Gel made with toning goji berry juice. Once you've hopped out of your shower, aka winter garden oasis, smooth everything over with three hydrating powerhouses for face, body and hands. This special gift includes one of our most luxurious facial creams, Gorgeous Moisturizer packed with soothing orange blossom honey, wheat germ oil and cleansing fresh fruit juices."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "5k1jUlZwIO", "data": {"text": "Made in Canada."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "D56FklXsgD", "data": {"text": "Gift contains:"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "HBnYmT9Tq5", "data": {"text": "Once Upon A Time Body Lotion 1.7 oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "2BcLwDgmAx", "data": {"text": "Gorgeous Moisturizer 0.3 oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "oORKl_G38p", "data": {"text": "Scrubee Body Butter"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "QwppeMQmfc", "data": {"text": "Berry Berry Christmas Shower Gel 3.3 fl oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "e-NqHZ00bn", "data": {"text": "Rose Jam Shower Gel 3.3 fl oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "JQ9OO6hcS_", "data": {"text": "Christmas Cranberry Soap 3.5 oz"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "qKYDrJa6H0", "data": {"text": "Sweet Wild Orange Hand Balm 1.7 oz "}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
translation.seoDescription: Wash and glow with this beautiful array of fruity and floral treats for shower and body.

thumbnail.alt: Winter Garden. A hexagonal-shaped gift box with seven LUSH pampering products around the edge.

product.name: Sweet Christmas
product.description:
{"time": 1701438731367, "blocks": [{"id": "etUR5_8BRm", "data": {"text": "This bright, candy-coloured gift is perfect for those who prefer the sweeter things in life. Hundreds and thousands of bubbles from Snow Fairy Roll bubble bar, and a comforting, buttery blanket of Butterbear bath bomb."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "6cSy_gHNdx", "data": {"text": "What\u2019s this ethical gift made of?
Ribbon: 100% recycled polyester made from recycled drinks bottles.
Box: Made from 100% recycled board.
Paper: Made from 100% recycled paper. No primary fibres are used for our paper production and for every tonne of 100% recycled paper produced, 70% less water is used compared to virgin fibre paper.
Eco Pops: Your gift will be packed with these expanded starch biodegradable product protectors."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "fbEoiSqheD", "data": {"text": "Mini Snow Fairy bubble bar
Butterbear bath bomb"}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
product.seoDescription: Indulge yourself in a candy Christmas with these two festive sweet treats for bath time fun!

translation.name: Sweet Christmas
translation.description: {"time": 1695140214963, "blocks": [{"id": "Gl3wAv_o0v", "data": {"text": "Smiles for miles. Make someone's day and night this holiday season with a duo of confectionery delights. Snow Fairy Roll Bubble Bar gives your recipient a bath brimming with cotton candy-scented bubbles, while Butterbear Bath Bomb envelops them in its sweet cocoa butter embrace. Thanks to this charming gift, the holidays just got a whole lot sweeter."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "LFGYYsIKQ7", "data": {"text": "Made in Canada."}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "gmvadmwk1Y", "data": {"text": "Gift contains:"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "ddaSSIx7bp", "data": {"text": "Snow Fairy Roll Bubble Bar"}, "type": "paragraph"}, {"id": "d3nLM8Qzgx", "data": {"text": "Butterbear Bath Bomb"}, "type": "paragraph"}], "version": "2.24.3"}
translation.seoDescription: Perfect for a stocking stuffer or holiday gift exchange, this pretty pink package features two sweet-smelling bath products with plenty of festive fizz and foam.

thumbnail.alt: Sweet Christmas. A vibrantly wrapped gift box with Butterbear bath bomb and mini Snow Fairy Roll bubble bar on top.

images.alt: Sweet Christmas. A vibrantly wrapped gift box with Butterbear bath bomb and mini Snow Fairy Roll bubble bar on top.
Sweet Christmas and its two included bath products are on a dark chromatic platform among geometric shapes.
